description: Up your stir-fry game with this vegan udon noodle recipe. Bursting with green vegetables, mushrooms and sesame, it's sure to be a hit.
name: Sesame Mushroom & Udon Noodle Bowls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch choy sum, cut into 10cm lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook noodles in a saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions.
Meanwhile, heat vegetable oil in a large, deep frying pan or wok over high heat. Add red onion and mushroom, then cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until mushroom is golden and tender.
Using tongs, transfer noodles to pan, reserving boiling water. Add sauces, sugar and sesame oil to pan, then cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until warmed through.

Meanwhile, cook beans, snow peas and choy sum in boiling water for 1 minute or until just tender. Drain. Add to pan with half the onion, then toss to combine. Serve noodle mixture topped with cashews and remaining onion.
